docTitle.titlePart: Hollow Cathode Discharges for Gas Lasers

titlePage.byline: Central Research Institute for Physics, H-1525 Budapest 114, P.O.B. 49, Hungary

front.div:
A review of hollow cathode discharges for gas (metal vapour) lasers is given. Particular attention
is paid to the arc free discharge region and to the possibility of increasing the intensity of the
ionic spectrum of the discharges.
With the exception of the 632.8 nm neon line all
